701492f-a.title: Bronx: Morris Park Avenue - Bogart Avenue
701492f-a.text:
Morris Park Ave., east from Bogart Ave., showing, under construction,
that part of the thoroughfare which was cut through the property of the
former Morris Park Race Track. The expanse of land, seen on both sides
of the avenue, is that of the former race track, as it appears after it
was dismantled.
Spring 1913.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
701492f-a.folder: Morris Park Avenue & Bogart Avenue, Bronx, NY
